text: Marco Mukoso Hausiku (25 November 1953Profile at Namibian Parliament website . â€“ 26 August 2021) was a Namibian politician. He was Deputy Prime Minister of Namibia from 2010 to 2015. He was Minister of Foreign Affairs from 2004 to 2010. He was a member of the Swapo Party. Hausiku died on 26 August 2021 at the age of 67.Swapo deputy SG Hausiku dies ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2021 deaths Category:SWAPO politicians
title: Marco Hausiku
